1.description: You’re in a 3rd-floor classroom of your college when a massive earthquake hits. The room shakes, windows crack, students scream. What do you do?

choices.text: Drop under your desk, cover, and hold on.
Rush for the stairwell immediately.
Grab the emergency radio from the cabinet.

2A.description: The quake subsides. Dust fills the room, but the building stands. The stairwell outside is jammed with panicking students.

choices.text: Push through the crowd to escape first.
Calm the crowd and lead them slowly.
Break a window and try climbing down via pipes.

2B.description: You rush to the stairs. A teacher is trapped under debris. Students push from behind in panic.

choices.text: Help the teacher out before escaping.
Abandon the teacher and move ahead.
Call for other students to help while you guide evacuation.

2C.description: You limp into the courtyard with the radio. Alarms ring, dust fills the air, injured students cry out for help.

choices.text: Use first aid on the wounded.
Organize students into groups for safety.
Head to the principal’s office to grab supplies.

3A1.description: You push through the crowd. A stampede injures many, and others distrust you.

choices.text: Continue outside alone.

3A2.description: You calm the crowd. Students follow you down carefully, though some fall in aftershocks.

choices.text: Lead them to the courtyard.

3A3.description: You escape through a window. A few follow, but you leave many behind.

choices.text: Find shelter outside.

3B1.description: You lift debris and help the teacher. Students see your courage.

choices.text: Help guide everyone to safety.

3B2.description: You abandon the teacher. You survive, but whispers spread.

choices.text: Reach the courtyard alone.

3B3.description: You call others to help. The teacher is saved, though chaos remains.

choices.text: Exit with the group.

3C1.description: You tend to the injured. Students gather around you for support.

choices.text: Stay with them until rescue arrives.

3C2.description: You organize a small camp in the courtyard. People feel safer.

choices.text: Maintain order and wait.

3C3.description: You gather food, water, and a flashlight. But your injury worsens.

choices.text: Give supplies to others before collapsing.
